main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing three flying saucers in the sky over Baltimore on July 7, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as shiny, round, and saucer-shaped,Multiple individuals reported seeing the objects, including Mrs. John Winkle and Clarence Hoffman,The sightings occurred over a span of about an hour and a half,One witness, Gordon Gray, claimed to have chased the objects in his car,The objects were observed moving at high speeds without making any noise.
